Review-1 text: Over the past few years, the service has grown very much. Due to this we urgently needed the help of qualified DevOps engineers. We are very happy that we choose Mad Devs and we are satisfied not only with the result of the work, but with the process itself. These guys are very responsive, understanding and ready to make a couple extra steps to solve our problems, no matter how difficult they were. These guys really enjoy their work!
Review-2 text: From the first call with Mad Devs CEO, Alla I felt comfortable and trusted her and her team to be able to deliver the functionality and features I set out. We are a very small team based in London UK and we do not have a project manager. Alla and the team stepped in, took ownership and directed the project in the right way. I am sure we will continue our relationship into the future, work in partnership and reap the rewards. When it will be fully completed and delivered, the platform will have a significant impact on teacher workload internationally.
Review-3 text: We would never had a better deal on the labour market on our own. Buying from MadDevs was our best way of finding a top-notch DevOps engineer.
Review-4 text: Mad Devs is not just the technical support and software development partners, it is the place where work professionals who fully study the partner’s business model and take into account all the small details in the implementation of new features and services. We’ve been working with Mad Devs for 5 years on Namba Food service. Throughout the entire period of cooperation, the company provides effective support. They have a huge advantage and differ from other companies in their ability to think outside the box and find a solution in any difficult situation. We are immensely pleased that there is such a team of specialists in the market that invests the most in the partner's project and skillfully provides services.
Review-5 text: I’ve been working with Mad Devs on Diesel Mobile application since 2016. During our cooperation, the team has shown itself to be competent and adequate specialists at all stages of the development of the application, starting from the discussion of the project and the development of the technical assignment to the implementation, from the general idea to the running application. Mad Devs team is always open to discuss any details of the project and proposals. The development is carried out qualitatively and in time, all the arising difficulties and Problems are solved promptly. The company MadDevs fully justified my expectations and I am sure that our cooperation will continue.
Review-6 text: I've been working with MadDevs since January 2018 and never regretted. I truly enjoyed collaborating with professional programmers as they always met deadlines. Besides I would like to thank the management of the company for their cooperation as well as willingness to help startup.
